header.appSubtitle: HTW Berlin - Big Data Analytics - Group 04

noConnection.title: Check your services
noConnection.message: The statistics service could not be reached within the last five seconds or just disconnected. Please make sure it is up and running. This client should then connect automatically. If successfully connected, a green icon will be displayed in the header/sidenav.

dig.illegalLeading: Illegal leading character. Must be lowercase letter or number.
dig.illegalTrailing: Illegal trailing character. Must be lowercase letter or number.

snackbar.languageSwitched: The language has been switched successfully.

size.changeTo: Change size to "{{ size }}" (might only be noticeable on larger screens)
size.current: Current size: "{{ size }}" (might only be noticeable on larger screens)

general.interact: Hint: Hover/tap charts in order get more information and resize them using the S/M/XL buttons.

tabExplanation.descriptive: This tab contains descriptive information concerning the given dataset and certain enhancements. The total number of Top-Level domains (TLD), MX-record information (most common MX servers and the number of MX servers per TLD) as well as respective information about A-records are provided.
tabExplanation.checked: Based on the imported data, this section presents the top 10 most common MX and A records. It should be noted that the representations are not based on the existing datasets, but on an updated version.
tabExplanation.redirect: Based on the imported data, the frequencies of HTTP status codes and redirects are displayed graphically in this area. In addition, the KPI's provide an overview of all existing redirects and with the status code 200. Furthermore, the top 10 most frequently redirected domains are displayed.
tabExplanation.mxGeo: Based on the imported data, the most common e-mail providers (top ten), the number of MX-records per city of the provider, and MX-records by their country are displayed graphically in this area. In addition, the KPI provides an overview of the percentage of MX records of e-mail providers outside Germany.
tabExplanation.ipv6soa: Top-Level domains (TLD) offering IPv6, SOA record details managing the request cycle of zone information updates by nameservers and the number of last-mentioned per domain are of interest for the analysis. This tab provides a quick overview on important key values and charts covering this information. Furthermore, the top ten primary nameservers (SOA masters, per domain given in the dataset) and the companies behind are depicted.

kpi.percentageOfMxLocalhost: Percentage of domains with "localhost" as MX-record
kpi.percentageOfRedirections200: Percentage of redirections with status code 200 (excluding null values)
kpi.percentageOfMxOutsideOfGermany: Percentage of MX-records from e-mail providers head-quartered outside of Germany
kpi.percentageOfIpV6ExcludingErrors: Percentage of domains supporting IPv6 (excluding request errors)
kpi.percentageOfSoaOutsideOfGermany: Percentage of nameservers from providers head-quartered outside of Germany
kpi.percentageOfMxCheckedUsingLocalhost: Percentage of domains with "localhost" as MX-record (updated)
kpi.percentageOfADiffIgnoringErrs: Percentage of changed A-records (excluding request errors)
kpi.percentageOfMxDiffIgnoringErrs: Percentage of changed MX-records (excluding request errors)

groupedMxCount.title: Grouped number of MX-records per domain

groupedACount.title: Grouped number of A-records per domain

topTenMxCountries.title: Number of MX-records grouped by provider countries (Top 10)

topTenMxCities.title: Number of MX-records grouped by provider cities (Top 10)

soaNameserversCountWhereNoErr.title: Grouped number of SOA nameservers per domain (excluding request errors)

topTenSoaCountries.title: Number of nameservers grouped by provider countries (Top 10)

topTenSoaCities.title: Number of nameservers grouped by provider cities (Top 10)

groupedMxCheckedCount.title: Grouped number of (checked) MX-records per domain

groupedACheckedCount.title: Grouped number of (checked) A-records per domain
